description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; bust-length image of a man in a black turtleneck on the right side of the image; over his shoulder in the lower left corner is a sun with rays emanating from it
portfolio: From Plate 9 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the Ninth Scene, Plate 9 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
